query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count, 'upgrade_requests' as table_name FROM upgrade_requests WHERE playerName LIKE '%Jaren%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) as count, 'player_upgrades' as table_name FROM player_upgrades WHERE playerName LIKE '%Jaren%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as count, 'upgrade_requests' as table_name FROM upgrade_requests WHERE playerName LIKE '%Jaren%' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) as count, 'player_upgrades' as table_name FROM player_upgrades WHERE playerName LIKE '%Jaren%'
